mapper.select: select a.creationtime createTime,a.eventdescribe eventDesc from jkpt_tsgl_complaint a where (a.telephone=#{searchInput} or a.platenumber=#{searchInput}) and a.isarchive='0' and a.isrecyclebin='0'
select a.creationtime createTime,a.eventdescribe eventDesc from jkpt_tsgl_complaint a where (a.telephone=#{searchInput} or a.platenumber=#{searchInput}) and a.isarchive='0' and a.isrecyclebin='0'
